vscode-tye.commands.refreshEntry.title: Refresh
vscode-tye.commands.debugAll.title: Debug
vscode-tye.commands.browseService.title: Browse
vscode-tye.commands.attachService.title: Attach
vscode-tye.commands.showLogs.title: Logs
vscode-tye.tasks.tye-run.properties.debu: Wait for debugger attach to specific service.
vscode-tye.tasks.tye-run.properties.dtra: Write distributed traces to the specified tracing provider.
vscode-tye.tasks.tye-run.properties.fram: The target framwork hint to use for all cross-targeting projects with multiple TFMs. This value must be a valid target framework for each individual cross-targeting project.
vscode-tye.tasks.tye-run.properties.logs: Write structured application logs to the specified log provider.
vscode-tye.tasks.tye-run.properties.metr: Write metrics to the specified metrics provider.
vscode-tye.tasks.tye-run.properties.path: A file or directory, and can be a .yaml, .sln, or project file.
vscode-tye.tasks.tye-run.properties.port: The port to run control plane on.
vscode-tye.tasks.tye-run.properties.tags: Filter the group of running services by tag.
vscode-tye.tasks.tye-run.properties.watc: Watches for code changes for all projects.
vscode-tye.views.services.contents: The extension requires you to run Tye in a command window. This extension will attempt to access `http://localhost:8000/api/v1/services` by default.
vscode-tye.views.services.name: Tye Services
